event.title: mapped by Surveyor-General Sir Thomas Mitchell in 1846

data.event: The district was first mapped by Surveyor-General Sir Thomas Mitchell in 1846.

event.title: had penetrated the area, and in 1849

data.event: By the end of the 1840s pastoralists had penetrated the area, and in 1849 Mitchell directed a surveyor, Burrowes, to select a township site on the Balonne River.
